[\[208b.1\]]can yin pas bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gzir zhing las pa na yang dang yang du brgyal bar gyur to/_/de nas yongs su skyo bas dbugs tsha ba ring po byung nas ded dpon rna can rjes su dran zhing du ba la zhugs te/_kyi hud 'di lta bu'i phyin ci log kun du gnas pa ni sdug
[\[208b.2\]]bsngal lo/_/gang grong khyer ma lus pa'i mchog du gyur cing /_dpal gyi phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong nas kyang tshe 'di la grong khyer thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur nas/_da ltar gzhan gyi khyim du gla mi'i las byed pa'i sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to/_/de de
[\[208b.3\]]ltar sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gzir zhing ngu ba la bltas nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma de cho nges 'debs pa la zhugs te/_kyi hud tshe 'di nyid la ded dpon rna can gyi chung ma ras ka shi pa la sogs pa gos sna tshogs gyon pa dang /_lus la dri zhim pa'i me tog gi phreng ba du mas
[\[208b.4\]]brgyan pa dang /_khur ba la rdzas dri zhim po du ma sbyar ba'i dri zhim pos bsgos pa dang /_lha'i bu mo bzhin du dga' ba'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du song nas bran po dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du rnams dang /_zas dang skom dang /_gos dang /_
[\[208b.5\]]rgyan la sogs pa ci rigs par 'ged pa yin na/_da ni tshe 'di nyid du skra spags shing lus la dri ma'i tshogs kyis gos pa dang /_bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis lus dang /_yan lag la sogs pa thams cad yongs su skams pa/_ras rnyings shing dengs la shin tu dri ma can
[\[208b.6\]]gyi dum bu ras rnying zhig brgya stong gi gnas su gyur pas rked pa'i phyogs bkab pa/_grong khyer ba thams cad kyi tha chad du gyur nas gzhan gyi khyim du gla mi'i las byed pas sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/kye ma'o skal ba'i phyir ci log_/kye ma'o
[\[208b.7\]]longs spyod rnams kyis shin tu g.yo ba/_kye ma'o las rnams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang smras pa/_dar gyi gos sogs rab gyon zhing /_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan te/_/sngon chad lha yi bu mo 'dra/_/da ltar lam po chen 'khyams/_/skal ba de nyid zad gyur pas/_/lus la dri mas gos gyur
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]cing /_/ras rnying dri nga'i dum bu gyon/_/da lta 'di 'dra gyur pa yin/_/sngon ni lha yi bu mo ltar/_/skyes pa'i mig gi bdud rtsir gyur/_/da ltar yi dwags mo 'dra bar/_/mthong nas de nyid yid kyang skyo/_/sngon ni nor gyis phun sum tshogs/_/grong khyer pa yi mchog gyur gang /_/de ni da ltar
[\[209a.2\]]phongs pa bas/_/shin tu phongs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/sngon gyi phun tshogs chen po la/_/dga' bas yongs su longs spyod pa/_/mya ngan sdug bsngal ldan pa yi/_/gnas skabs de 'dis thob par gyur/_/kye ma'o 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ngan/_/kye ma'o phun tshogs mi rtag nyid/_/gang zhig de ltar bder
[\[209a.3\]]gyur nyid/_/sdug bsngal snod can nyid du gyur/_/de nas ded dpon gyi chung ma mngag gzhug pa'i bu mo dang lhan cig tu rim pa de nyid kyis gzhan gyi khyim du gla mi'i las byed pa la zhugs pa na gzhon nu gzugs ngan gyi bsod nams kyi dbang gis nyin re zhing gla rnyed pa 'gribs par gyur to/_/ji tsam
[\[209a.4\]]na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe nyi ma ma nub bar du nyin mo las byed du bcug kyang ci yang rnyed par ma gyur pa nas/_ji srid las kyang sus kyang byed du ma bcug pa dang /_ji tsam na ded dpon gyi chung ma mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo de dang lhan cig kun du smra ba rtsom pa/_yang da ni las kyang byed du ma bcug gis rnam pa
[\[209a.5\]]thams cad du slong mo spyad par bya'o zhes bgros te/_de slong phor thogs nas slong mo spyad pa la zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu mi sdug pa 'gro nus pa de'i tshe de la mas bu da ni khyod rang nyid slong mo spyod du song la longs spyod cig ces smras nas/_des de la slong phor byin pa dang /_de slong phor de
[\[209a.6\]]thogs nas tshong 'dus su zhugs pa dang /_de yang pags pa'i mdog shin tu gnag pa/_gzugs shin tu mi sdug pa/_mtshan ma ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pas lus smad par 'os pa mthong ba dang /_'jig rten pa rnams shin tu yang rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur nas thur du lta zhing 'gro'o/_/
[\[209a.7\]]de gang gi khyim gyi sgor song ba der de'i lus las dri shin tu mi zhim pa 'byung ba dang /_mod kho na la sna khung gnyis bkag nas shing dang rdo ba dang gyo mo la sogs pas brdegs te 'di nas myur du song shig ces grong khyer gyi mi gtsang ba 'dam rdzab 'gro shes pa lta bur lta zhing skrod par byed de/_

[\[209b.1\]]gang dang gang du song ba de dang der shing dang rdo dang gyo mo la sogs pa rnams kyis brdegs nas skrod par byed do/_/des slong mo gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur cing shing dang rdo dang gyo mo la sogs pa rnams kyis brdegs pas slong phor yang chag par gyur nas/_smre sngags 'don bzhin du ma'i drung du phyin te/_

[\[209b.3\]]pas sgra dang bcas par rab tu dus te smras pa/_gang dang gang gi khyim sgor ni/_/slong mo spyad phyir bdag 'gro ba/_/de dang der ni gyo mo rdo/_/shing la sogs pa bdag la rdeg_/de thos pa dang ded dpon gyi chung mas gzhon nu mi sdug pa'i mgul nas 'khyud de/_sgra dang bcas pas dus te smras
[\[209b.4\]]pa/_nyes pa med kyang shin tu ni/_/gang dag gzhan gyis brdegs gyur pas/_/skye ba gzhan du bu khyod kyis/_/sdig pa mi bzad byas par nges/_/kyi hud khyod ni sdug bsngal lo/_/bde ba kun dang rnam bral ba/_/shin tu mi sdug gyur pa 'di/_/dman pa ci tsam mthong na go/_sems ldan snying rje
[\[209b.5\]]cis mi skye/_/kyi hud bcom zhing nyams pa bdag_/bu khyod kyi ni slong mo snod/_/bcom pas lus kyang bcom yin te/_/slong mo tsam gyis 'tsho ba yin/_/pha dang ma dang bral ba dang /_/khyim gyi rten ni med gyur la/_/gang gis snying rje spangs nas ni/_/khyod kyi slong snod de bcag gyur/_/rigs

[\[209b.7\]]gnod pas bcom par gyur/_/kyi hud dman pa'i bu la dpa' ba ni/_/gang gi snying la brtse ba mi sems pas/_/rdo dang so phag rtsub pa lta bu yi/_/sems can gang yin de ring khyod kyis smros/_/kyi hud sgo brgyas bcom pa yi/_/sdug bsngal gyis gdungs slong mo rgyu/_/ji ltar khyod la gzhan

[\[210a.1\]]rdeg par/_/'jig rten yid ni spro bar gyur/_/bkres dang skom pas yongs dub cing /_/phun tshogs kun gyis rnam spangs pa/_/nad dang sdug bsngal rnams kyis gdungs/_/khyed la su zhig brdeg par brtson/_/nyam thag dman pa'i bzhin gyis ni/_/ngu zhing bkres pas rab gzir ba/_/

[\[210a.4\]]gi rgyun gyis yan lag gos pa'i bu la 'khyud nas/_phyag dar dang /_gyo mo mi gtsang ba dang /_tsher ma la sogs pas khyab pa'i sar bsnyal te/_dal bu dal bus lag pas mnye bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na srang bar de na tshong dpon gyi bu dang /_ded dpon gyi bu dang /_gzhan yang
[\[210a.5\]]mtho zhing mtho ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ka shi ka'i ras dang /_ba ku la'i ras dang /_ko tam pa'i ras dang /_dar dang mon dar dang /_ras phra zhing rin che ba sna tshogs gyon pa dang /_mgul gdub dang /_gdu bu dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha dang /_do shal dang /_se mo do sna

[\[211a.1\]]yis/_/mal stan sngon ma byin pa yin/_/stan ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/dam pa rnams ni ma byin pas/_/gang gi tsher ma mang po yis/_/khyab pa'i sa yi gzhi la gnas/_/gang gi tsher mas khyab pa yi/_/sa gzhir yu bu rnam rgyu ba/_/sngon chad lham dang bzhon pa ni/_/bde ba skyed

[\[211b.1\]]kye ma'o bsod nams ma byas nyid/_/'di ltar rgyas pa'i grong khyer du'ang /_/mgon med yu bu ji bzhin no/_/'di dang gzhan dag yang ded dpon gyi chung ma bkres pas yongs su gdungs pa'i yid dang bdag nyid smre sngags 'don zhing gnas so/_/ded dpon rna can yang rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa

[\[212a.1\]]chung ma bran mo zhig dang lhan cig gnas la/_shin tu dman pas nyam chung ba'i bzhin dang /_ras kyi dum bu dri ma can gyis sked pa'i phyogs bkab pa dri ma'i tshogs lus la gos pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kyi hud 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras te/_brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /_

[\[212b.3\]]nyid yin pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston ka'i nyi ma 'char ka ltar 'od zer dmar ser 'gyed pa dang /_nor bu rang gi yon tan gyis yongs su spras pas/_kun nas dmar ser du snang ba dang /_nyi ma 'char kas phye ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar ma lus pa'i tshogs dang /_ut+pa la dang /_
[\[212b.4\]]margad dang /_'ja' tshon dang /_dri ma med pa'i glog 'khyil pa dang /_mar gyi rgyun blugs pa'i me'i tshogs ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi tshogs bkra shis pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rab rib dpag tu med pa'i tshogs rnam par 'jig cing /_rga shi srid pa'i gzeb 'dzin par mdzad pa/_

[\[230b.2\]]yin/_/de nas rgyal srung mas rang gi 'dod pa'i rnam pa thob par ma gyur pas/_/khros te smras pa/_shin tu 'dod pas gdungs par gyur ba na/_/gal te 'di na nga yis mi 'dod na/_/blo ngan khyod ni ring por mi thogs par/_/dngos po thams cad med par 'gyur du 'ong /_/mig ni gnyis po gang
[\[230b.3\]]yin pas/_/khyod ni 'di na dregs thob pa/_/mi ring ba ni de dag gis/_/rgud par gyur la blta bar bya/_/ku na las smras pa/_chos ni rnam dag gyur na bdag ni myur du 'chi bar gnas par gyur kyang bla/_/skye bo dam pas bdag smad gyur pa'i 'tsho ba bdag la dgos ma yin/_/gang las mtho ris dag
[\[230b.4\]]dang chos 'jig 'gyur ba'i 'tsho des ci zhig bya/_/mkhas pas zil gyis mnan pa'i bkren gyur bdag ni 'chi ba nyid yin mod/_/ji tsam na rgyal srung ma de kun la la glags skabs tshol zhing gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po a sho kas byang phyogs kyi grong khyer rdo 'jog pa dang rtsod par gyur
[\[230b.5\]]pa thos pa dang /_rgyal po rang nyid chas par gyur to/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gzhon nu brdzang du gsol/_/des ni thul par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos kun la bos te smras pa/_kun la grong khyer rdo 'jog 'dul bar 'gro nus sam/_kun las smras pa/_lha rab
[\[230b.6\]]tu mchi lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos yid la rab dad pa'i/_/bu zhes bya ba'i bsam pa shes pa dang /_/brtse dang phun tshogs na tshod la rigs pa'i/_/chad pa'i rkyen ni lung du bsgo bar gyur/_/de nas rgyal po a sho kas grong khyer brgyan pa dang /_lam mdzes par byas te/_rgan po dang /_

[\[231a.1\]]yangs shing ut+pal sngon po dang /_/'dra ba 'di la blta ba gang yin pa/_/der ni dpal yod bde ldan rims nad bral/_/ji tsam na bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig gis mthong ba dang /_ku na la'i mig ni yun ring po mi thogs par 'gyur te/_rgyal po a sho kas de'i mig gnyis la

[\[231a.4\]]mdzes par byas te/_bum pa gang ba mar sar gyis brgyan pas mdun bsus so/_/yang bshad pa/_rdo 'jog pa yi grong bas thos nas ni/_/rin chen bum gang pa la sogs pa yi/_/mchod pa thogs te mdun du song nas ni/_/sa bdag de la mang du rjed par gyur/_/mdun bsus nas thal mo sbyar te smras
[\[231a.5\]]pa/_bdag cag rnams ni gzhon nu la 'gal bar bgyid pa yang ma lags la/_rgyal po a sho ka la yang ma lags mod kyi/_'on kyang blon po mi srun pa dag 'ongs nas bdag cag la brnyas par bgyis lags mod/_ci tsam na kun la bsnyen bkur chen pos grong khyer rdo 'jog tu zhugs par gyur

[\[235a.1\]]cing /_/sems kyi mya ngan ma lus 'byin par byed/_/de nas kun las chung ma la rjes su brtse bas smras pa/_mya ngan la sten pa rigs pa ma yin gyi ngu ba thong /_ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu nye bar gnas pa yin no/_/'jig rten 'di las bdag nyid
[\[235a.2\]]can du shes/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal dngos po dang ldan par/_/shes na sdug dang bral la zhen mi bya/_/de bas sdug pa mchi ma 'byin mi rigs/_/gzhan yang mig phyung ba ngas da ci zhig bya nye du'i gan du song /_khyod kyang sdug bsngal gyi skal pa can du ma byed cig_/gser phreng mas smras pa/_
[\[235a.3\]]skyes bu gang zhig dpal rgyas bud med ni/_/brtse bas rjes 'jug pa la ngo mtshar med/_/gang tshe dpal nyams pa na rjes 'brang ba'i/_/bud med de ni mi nang lha dang mtshungs/_/de nas kun la chung ma dang lhan cig grong khyer las byung ba dang /_mngal du zhugs pa nas brtsams te/_shin
[\[235a.4\]]tu gzhon sha can gyi lus dang ldan pas/_las ci yang byed par mi nus kyi/_gzhan du na pi wang dag rdung zhing glu dag len par nus so/_/de nas de gser phreng ma'i lag pa la 'jus te/_gzhon nu skyed byed phrag par khur nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu sdug dpa' bo'i rigs
[\[235a.5\]]las skyes/_/khyod dang rab sdug bsngal te/_/yu bus mthar ni slong mo thob/_/mi bzad las ni sngon byas yin/_/sgyu ma lta bur mi brtan pa'i/_/dbang phyug la ni su yid rton/_/mya ngan med kyi bur gyur la/_/gnas skabs 'di 'dra thob par gyur/_/las byas pa ni tshogs pa
[\[235a.6\]]dang /_/ldan pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta bu/_/las ni lhan cig byas pas na/_/lhan cig longs ni spyad par gyur/_/de bas na da ci zhig bya ste/_pa ta li pu trar song la/_rgyal po mya ngan med pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/'dzam gling dbang phyug mnga' bdag de/_/nga yi dka' ba
[\[235a.7\]]byed pa'i pha/_/de ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin zhing /_/nga la rtag tu rjes brtse yin/_/de nas kun las pi wang rdung zhing glu len pa dang /_gzhan gyi khyim rnams su tshul 'dis 'tsho ba sgrub cing chas so/_/bsnyen bkur chen po las nyams shing /_/'ong bskal dman sems can ni/_/

[\[235b.1\]]slong mos rgyu bar byed pa la/_/chos ldan skyes bu su zhig ster/_/pha dang ma spangs longs spyod dang /_/zas dang mal cha khyem med pa/_/nyam ngar rab zhugs long ba la/_/slong mo ma yis ster bar mdzod/_/longs spyod glog 'gyu dang 'dra zhing /_/zil pa'i chu thigs 'dra ba la/_/'gro bkren

[\[235b.3\]]gser phreng ma yang lam gang nas pa ta li pu tra nas 'ongs pa'i lam de nyid nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gro'o/_/de song ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnas su phyin to/_/de nas kun las gser phreng ma la dris pa/_bzang mo gang yu bus phyin pa'i grong khyer 'di gang zhig yin/_btsun mos mthong
[\[235b.4\]]ba dang /_brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/_/skad cig tsam na 'du shes rnyed de smras pa/_gang tshe dpal dang ldan par 'gro ba na/_/skye bo bye ba gnas 'dir lhags par lhags/_/khyed mig bral nas deng ni 'dir 'ongs pas/_/'du byed g.yo ba de ni cir mi rung /_/ji tsam na rim gyis pa ti li pu

[\[253a.4\]]bslab pa la rjes su slob po[#]/_/rjes su sgrub po[#]/_/sems kyi rgyan gyi phyir dang /_sems kyi yo byad kyi phyir dang /_don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'grub pa'i slad du/_bdag gso sbyong la gnas par slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol/_de ltar

[\[253a.6\]]du/_srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub mo dang /_ngag 'khyal ba dang /_brnab
[\[253a.7\]]sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba las bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o zhes pa bslab pa bcu'i cho ga klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas gsungs pa rtse thang [#]lo tsA ba gzhon nu'i zhabs kyi 'gyur//_//

[\[253b.1\]{D4149}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ye d+ha rmASh+TI ka_/bod skad du/_ye d+harmA'i 'grel ba/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/da ni ye d+harmA he tu pra bA wa he tuM/_zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud rab tu gnas pa'i don du grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa yin te/_'chad pa po
[\[253b.2\]]rnams la yang gsungs pa yin no/_/mdo sde dang ni rnal 'byor gyi/_/khang par yang ni 'jug pa nang /_/ye d+harmA sogs tshigs bcad kyis/_/sangs rgyas grub mtha'i phyag rgyas btab/_/ces so/_/de yang ye d+harmA sogs ni bod kyi skad du/_chos rnams
[\[253b.3\]]gang dag rgyus 'byung de dag ni/_/rgyu dang de la 'gog pa gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/chos rnams gang dag rgyus byung zhes pa la gang dag ni rab tu
[\[253b.4\]]grags pa bdun po rnams te/_ma rig pa la sogs pa'i lcags sgrog gis kun du bskor ba'i 'khor lo ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no/_/de dag ni zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang /_las dang sdug bsngal gyi yan lag gsum dang /_gnyis dang
[\[253b.5\]]bdun gyis phye bas gsum du yang gyur pa yin te/_ma rig pa'i thog ma yin par sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no/_/ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang /_gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_
[\[253b.6\]]tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi ste bcu gnyis po rnams so/_/ma rig pa ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi bdag nyid can no/_/'du byed ni sngon gyi las so/_/rnam par shes pa ni mngal
[\[253b.7\]]du 'jug pa'o/_/ming dang gzugs ni nur nur po la sogs pa lnga'o/_/skye mched drug ni mig la sogs pa la 'dod do/_/reg pa ni yul dang /_dbang po dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams phrad pa'o/_/tshor ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]nyid can no/_/sred pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so/_/len pa ni 'dod pa'i yul len pa'o/_/srid pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa'i 'bras bu can gyi las so/_/skye ba ni slar yang phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba'o/_/rga shi
[\[254a.2\]]ni gsal lo/_/dang po dang /_brgyad pa dang /_dgu pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'o/_/las ni gnyis pa dang /_bcu pa'o/_/lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal lo/_/de gsum gyis bsdus pa'i phyir bcu gnyis ni chos rnams so/_/gsum las gsum dang gnyis
[\[254a.3\]]las gnyis 'byung la/_/bdun las bdun yin pa'i phyir/_de kho na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyu dang 'bras bu yang ste/_'gro ba thams cad de/_'dir sems can gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/_stong pa 'od zer ltar chos rnams las stong pa'i chos
[\[254a.4\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_kha ton dang /_mar me lta bu dag ni rgyu las byung ba'i don du'o/_/rgyu dang de rnams kyi yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te zhes pa ni/_de ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir te/_gzhan ma
[\[254a.5\]]yin par gsung ba nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gsungs pa yin no/_/de la 'gog pa gang yin pa'ang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'ang gi sgra las de kho na rgyu dang bsams par gsungs pa yin gyi/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yan lag bcu gnyis
[\[254a.6\]]'gog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsungs pa yin te/_zung 'jug pa'i bde ba brtags pa nam mkha'i me tog ma yin zhing sems med pa bems po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/_/zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa gsung
[\[254a.7\]]ba'i tshul can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_phyin ci ma log par gsung ba'i tshul can gyi tshangs pa'i cho ga'o/_/'di ni slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa gzhon nus bsgyur ba'o//_//
